_header: Our Holy Father that is in heaven
_description: The Pater Noster — six couplets, inserted in the Gospel for the First Friday in Lent of the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Oure hali fader þat es in heuynBlisced be þi name to neuyn…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And lede vs na temping vntillBot schild vs euer fro alkins ill
BLHar4196.Note: Embedded in 1020; preceded by Latin, “Pater noster qui es in celis” (rubric); ends “Amen.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.36.
